title: Quintin Geldenhuys
text: Quintin Geldenhuys (born 19 June 1981) is a <a href="South%20Africa">South Africa</a>-born <a href="Italy">Italian</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. Geldenhuys, who plays as a <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%234.%20%26amp%3B%205.%20Lock">lock</a>, represents the Italian <a href="Pro14">Pro14</a> franchise <a href="Zebre">Zebre</a>. He made his debut for <a href="Italy%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Italy</a> against <a href="Australia%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Australia</a> on 13 June 2009. He qualified for Italy through <a href="Naturalization">residency</a>. He played 11 games, starting 11, playing 796 minutes in the 2015-2016 Guinness Pro12 series.
